ldmsd-exporter (metric rate per minute per ldmsd)

panels.description: The number of metrics per sampler type
panels.title: Metrics Per Sampler Plugin

panels.description: How far behind are consumers for the kafka topic nersc-ldms
panels.title: Kafka consumer lag

panels.description: sum(count_over_time({data_type="cray-logs-containers",namespace="sma", pod="nersc-ldms-aggr-0"} |= "connection error to sock" | pattern "<_> Producer <hostname>: connection error to sock <_>"[1m])) by (container,hostname)
panels.title: NERSC Agg - connection error (per 2m)

panels.description:
Ran base_sample_begin(),  but have not reached base_sample_end()

sum(count_over_time({data_type="cray-logs-containers",namespace="sma", pod=~"nersc-ldms-aggr-0"} |= "is inconsistent" |pattern "<_>Set <hostname>/<metric> is inconsistent<_>"[10m])) by(container, metric)
panels.title: NERSC Agg - is inconsistent (per 2m)

panels.description: sum(count_over_time({data_type="cray-logs-containers",namespace="sma", pod=~"nersc-ldms-aggr-0"} |= "there is an outstanding update" |pattern "<_>Set <hostname>/<metric>: there is an outstanding update<_>"[10m])) by(container, metric)
panels.title: NERSC Agg - outstanding update (per 2m)

panels.description:
Oversampling: The update and previous contain the same sampleID.

sum(count_over_time({data_type="cray-logs-containers",namespace="sma", pod=~"nersc-ldms-aggr-0"} |= "oversampled" |pattern "<_>Set <hostname>/<metric> <_>"[10m])) by(container, metric)
panels.title: NERSC Agg - oversampling (per 2m)
